website_summaries.verdict: An affordable choice for hobbyists. Well-made for various small tasks.
pros: A rugged mill built for hobbyists and smaller jobs
Jewelry makers love its control and precision for intricate work
cons: Not intended for heavy-duty jobs or milling bulky materials

customer_reviews.title: Run out
customer_reviews.text: Great aluminum milling machine. Great castiron base. Small hand wheels. Great useable RPM and power. Spindle runout about .002 " this makes cutting harder metal not so easy at slower rpms.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this mill. Its well built and accurate. I may convert it to cnc in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: This product was opened and missing the milling cutters shown in the picture
customer_reviews.text: This product's packaging was open when received and missing the 3 tungsten milling cutters depicted in the picture of the Proxxon Mf70 and included by the manufacturer. Sloppy on the part of Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Anand Ramakrishnan

customer_reviews.title: SOLID,ZERO PLAY
customer_reviews.text: just got this in today and I have to say I'm very very pleased with it I still haven't used it but just you can tell from the quality of this thing it's awesome it's very heavy for its size, very heavy duty, nice and solid and there is zero I mean zero play in the hand wheels five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Goff

customer_reviews.title: XY table is not good
customer_reviews.text: The build quality is good but the XY table is useless.
customer_reviews.author: WalterS

customer_reviews.title: Great versatile powerhouse in miniature!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little machine. Been using mine to create models for casting jewelry and it really is a powerhouse. Needs some tweaking of the beds, but other than that, works beautifully. Don't be fooled by its half pint size, this is no toy. It's a serious tool.
customer_reviews.author: Saro T.

customer_reviews.title: very good stuff
customer_reviews.text: why i dont get this item sir in my foto and also mill bit???
customer_reviews.author: Indra Gotama

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product works great as advertised. I am still learning how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is an Ideal machine, small, so limited to craftsman.
customer_reviews.author: dennis L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can't live without this. Taking it to the desert island.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Sandig

customer_reviews.title: Advertised as useable for turning out 80% lowers. Not ...
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as useable for turning out 80% lowers. Not even close. Too small to even mount the lower much less be able to cut it. End mills bits will not even chuck up.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The service and the product were OK, but I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis G. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Works for me - small maker beam or hobby projects
customer_reviews.text: I also have the proxxon chop saw and both small tools are perfect for my needs (hobby size repair and building)
customer_reviews.author: NYpirate

product_meta.title: Proxxon 37110 MICRO Mill MF 70
product_meta.description:
The unit is supplied with a stable base of cast iron. Both vertical column and compound table are of treated, high quality aluminum. All axes are play-free and have adjustable slides. The headstock, made of die-cast aluminum, houses the 24 pole balanced special motor and provides stability even at high operating speeds. This stability facilitates the use of the finest cutters. Six triple slit, hardened MICROMOT steel collets come with the machine and cover shank sizes of 1/32", 1/16", 5/64", 3/32", 7/64" and 1/8" (1.0, 1.5, 2.0, 2.35, 3.0, 3.2mm). The table is fitted with three T-slots of the 15/32" x 15/64" x 13/64" (12 x 6 x 5mm) MICROMOT-norm. An adjustable ruler scale eases the positioning of the work piece. All hand wheels are zero adjustable with 1 revolution = 1/32" (1.0mm), 1 division = .002" (0.05mm). Technical data: Speed 5,000 - 20,000rpm; Table Size 7 7/8" x 2 3/4" (200 x 70mm); X-Y Travel 5 17/64" and 1 13/16" (134 and 46mm); Vertical Travel 2 3/4" (70mm); Footprint Size 5 7/64" x 8 55/64" (130 x 225mm) Height 13 25/64" (340mm); Max. Power 1/8hp (100W); Volts 110 - 120V AC, 60Hz; Weight 15.5 lb (7kg)

AMAZON.COM
Proxxon micro mill MF 70 - This small and beautiful unit is ideal - the accurate mill for lab, optician, jewelry, electronic and model building projects. Mill is made with a cast iron base. The vertical column and compound lathe are treated, high quality aluminum. All axes are play-free and have adjustable slides. The headstock, made of die cast aluminum, houses 24 pole balanced special motor and provides stability even at high operating speeds. This stability facilitates the use of the finest cutters. Comes with 6 triple slit hardened steel collets 1/32-Inch, 1/16-Inch, 5/64-Inch, 3/32-Inch, 7/64-Inch and 1/8-Inch (1.0, 1.5, 2.0, 2.35, 3.0 and 3.2mm) table has three T-slots and an adjustable ruler scale which eases the positioning of work-piece. All hand wheels are zero adjustable with one revolution equals 3/64-Inch (1.0mm) 1 division equals .002-Inch (0.05mm).

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Proxxon micro mill MF 70 - This small and beautiful unit is ideal - the accurate mill for lab, optician, jewelry, electronic and model building projects. Mill is made with a cast iron base. The vertical column and compound lathe are treated, high quality aluminum.

See more
feature_bullets: Quiet, precise and vibration-free for fatigue free use
Low weight and slim design, without ever compromising performance

specifications.Warranty Description: Limited Warranty of Proxxon Power Tools for home use. Prox-Tech, Inc. warrants to the original purchaser only that all Proxxon consumer power tools will be free from defects in material or workmanship for a period of two years from the date of purchase. Seller's sole obligation and your exclusive remedy under this limited warranty and, to the extent permitted by law, any warranty or condition implied by law, shall be the repair or replacement of parts, without charge, which are defective in material or workmanship and which have not been misused, carelessly handled, or misrepaired by persons other than Seller or Authorized Service Station. This limited warranty does not apply to accessory items such as circular saw blades, drill bits, router bits jigsaw blades, sanding belts, grinding wheels and other related items. Damage to the product resulting from tampering, accident, abuse, negligence, unauthorized repairs or alterations, unapproved attachments or other causes unrelated to problems with material or workmanship are not covered by this warranty. Any implied warranties shall be limited in duration to two years from date of purchase. Some states in the U.S. and some Canadian provinces do not allow limitations on how long an implied warranty lasts, so the above limitation may not apply to you. In no event shall seller be liable for any incidental or consequential damages
